name: Refine Tool Classes
description: Evaluate and expand attributes for detailed task management; improve robustness of PlanMaker and FileReader for diverse cases.

name: Complete Core Integration
description: Verify planner's ability to analyze directory structure and improve Connector for enhanced OpenAI interactions.

name: Testing & Validation
description: Develop test cases for tool functionalities, and conduct feedback sessions to validate the utility of generated plans.

name: Documentation & Enhancement
description: Create detailed documentation, ensuring user ease, and explore adaptability for different use cases.

name: Future Prospects
description: Investigate further machine learning enhancements for predictive and cognitive capabilities beyond OpenAI API usage.
